CustomField.description: This field is used to record the customer facing messaging pertaining to a given incident. The messaging falls under two different categories, "Product" & "Service" related. There is a template for each that can be found here: https://sites.google.com/a/salesforce.com/release-operations-program-management/Home/release-processes/whats-on-the-release-operations-backlog/root-cause-analysis-process.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is in the process of being EOL'd. Please attach the RCM to the appropriate RCA record.
CustomField.label: Root Cause Messaging
